org.gvsig.fmap.mapcontext.rendering.legend.styling

Interface ILabelable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    GraphicLayer, VectorLayer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultGraphicLayer, FLyrVect, FLyrVect, MapSheetsGrid

    public interface ILabelable
    This interface enables support for labeling an object such as a layer, but also others, if any. It gives support for detecting if labeling is being applied (isLabeled() and setIsLabeled()), to manage the labeling strategy (getLabelingStrategy() and setLabelingStrategy). The labeling is performed by the drawLabels(..) method.
